display_long_description:
At Squatopia, our mission is simple: bring free, high-quality fitness gaming to everyone. That’s why 25 exercises are completely free—forever. No trials, no daily limits, just real, full-body workouts that turn squats, lunges, curls, and crunches into powerful attacks against demons in this MR/VR roguelike.

[media]

With over 300 randomized unique workout variations and 25 distinct attacks, the possible combinations skyrocket into the billions, ensuring every workout and playthrough feels fresh, exhilarating, and no two are ever the same. This variety keeps workouts fun, combats exercise plateaus, and keeps you motivated to push further. Level up, earn rewards, and stay engaged in your fitness journey. Squatopia turns your exercise into an exciting battle!

💪 25 Free Exercises – Unlimited access to these 25 strength training movements forever!

🎮 Gamified Fitness Combat – Turn workouts into epic battles!

✨ Billions of Possible Combinations – No two workouts are ever the same!

🆕 Regular Updates – Fresh challenges, enemies, and content!

😎 MR & VR Modes – Choose Mixed or Virtual Reality for immersive gameplay!

Start fighting for fitness today—for free!
